step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and wrists close to the target. Focus on slightly more consistent elbow positioning.
Excellent! Your shoulder and elbow alignment is very good here. Continue to maintain this precision.
Your shoulders and elbows are well-aligned. Try to keep your wrists a bit closer to the target for even better form.
Good effort on shoulder and elbow alignment. For the next repetitions, aim to bring your wrists closer to the target.
Your shoulders and elbows are well-positioned. Keep working on bringing your wrists closer to the target for improved form.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists closer to the target in steps 3, 4, and 5. This will help you get the most out of the arm strength and lymph drainage.
